title: Using Ekobol's Social Media Scheduler
author: Ekobol Marketing Team
image_caption: Plan and automate your social media posts.
intro: Social media is essential as a marketing tool for e-commerce businesses, but posting consistently across multiple platforms can be time-consuming. Ekobol's Social Media Scheduler allows you to easily create and schedule your social media posts from one place, even auto-generating content with AI support.
p1: Log in to your Ekobol dashboard. Navigate to the "Marketing Tools" section in the left sidebar. You'll find the "Social Media Scheduler" section at the bottom of the page.
p2: Type your message in the "Post Content" text area. Optionally, use "Generate with AI" to have AI draft or improve your content based on keywords you provide.
p3: Click on the "Schedule Date and Time" field and select your desired time from the date/time picker. AI can even suggest optimal posting times based on when your audience is most active.
p4: Check the boxes for supported platforms like Instagram, Facebook, and Twitter. Ekobol will automatically publish your post across all selected platforms.
p5: Click the "Schedule Post" button. Your post is now queued to be automatically published at the specified date and time.
p6: Use Ekobol's analytics section to track the performance of your social media posts. Monitor metrics like reach, engagement, and traffic directed to your website or product listings.
conclusion: Ekobol's Social Media Scheduler simplifies how you manage your social media presence, enabling you to market more effectively and reclaim your most valuable asset—time.
help_text: Need more help? Find more guides and answers in our Help Center.
